com.sap.conn.idoc

Class IDocException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IDocElementException, IDocMetaDataUnavailableException, IDocParseException

    public class IDocException
extends Exception
    General IDoc exception class.

                     String detailMessage,
                     Throwable cause)

        Parameters:
        group - the error group.
        detailMessage - the detail message.
        cause - the cause of this exception.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroup

        public final int getGroup()
        Returns the error group.

        The error group can be one of the following constants:

        Constant Description
        IDOC_ERROR_INITIALIZATION An error occurred during the initialization process.
        IDOC_ERROR_SYNTAX An IDoc syntax error has been detected.
        IDOC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_OPERATION The desired operation is not supported within the current context.
        IDOC_ERROR_METADATA_UNAVAILABLE The meta data for a document or a segment is not available.
        IDOC_ERROR_ILLEGAL_TYPE The specified document or segment type is not allowed.
        IDOC_ERROR_FIELD_NOT_FOUND A field with a given name could not be found.
        IDOC_ERROR_FIELD_CONVERSION A field conversion operation failed.
        IDOC_ERROR_PARSE_FAILURE An error occurred while parsing an IDoc.
        IDOC_ERROR_NO_QUEUE_HANDLER A queued IDoc was received, but no appropriate handler is available.
        Returns:
        the error group.

      • getLocalizedMessage

        public String getLocalizedMessage()
        Returns the localized detail message string of this exception including information about the error group and key. The default implementation returns the same result as getMessage().
        Overrides:
        getLocalizedMessage in class Throwable
        Returns:
        the localized detail message.

      • getKey

        public String getKey()
        Returns the error key.
        Returns:
        the error key.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage()
        Returns the detail message string of this exception including information about the error group and key.
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class Throwable
        Returns:
        the detail message.
